content.description: Source: V-Dem Project, 20200 -- Least Independence, 4 -- Most Independence
content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question: 

(a) Describe the trend in judicial independence in Nigeria between 1990 and 2019. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about political legitimacy in Nigeria between 1990 and 2019.

(c) Explain why judicial independence in Nigeria differs from judicial independence in China.

frqParts.text:
Respond to all parts of the question: 

(a) Describe the trend in judicial independence in Nigeria between 1990 and 2019. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about political legitimacy in Nigeria between 1990 and 2019.

(c) Explain why judicial independence in Nigeria differs from judicial independence in China.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
